creator: aalmenar@conectium.com
text:
I recently downloaded Tomcat 4.1.10-LE-JDK14.tar.gz file and when trying to 
access the admin webapp (WITH NO CHANGES ON CONFIG) it didnt worked. 
 
Later i downloaded tomcat 4.1.10 full version and the admin webapp worked. 
 
Is this a bug on Ant Build Script ??

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
The LE is meant to be run on JDK 1.4. If you have a properly configured system,
it works. If you are unsure about what to download, get the full version.

I have JDK 1.4 and everything works fine, is correctly configured but the 
admin webapp is the only thing that doesnt work !! 
 
I know its for JDK1.4 cause THE NAME OF THE FILE SAYS THAT I CAN READ !!!!!
creator: aalmenar@conectium.com
